message.raw:
FIxed a bug in the multi-notebook setup where a restarted tab would not remove itself from the correct notebook.
This was possibly the cause of a segfault we saw earlier.
Tabs can now restart in-place no matter what notebook they're in!
All I changed was to have tabs update self.notebook to self._toplevelget_parent() whenever close() was called on them.

message:
FIxed a bug in the multi-notebook setup where a restarted tab would not remove itself from the correct notebook.
This was possibly the cause of a segfault we saw earlier.
Tabs can now restart in-place no matter what notebook they're in!
All I changed was to have tabs update self.notebook to self._toplevelget_parent() whenever close() was called on them.
